it was Kenyon Martin 's defense that had coach George Karl talking. Allen Iverson had 36 points, Carmelo Anthony added 33 and Kenyon Martin shut down Toronto all-star Chris Bosh late as Denver rallied to beat the Toronto Raptors 109-100 on Sunday afternoon. Kenyon Martin 's defense on Chris Bosh was incredible and got better as the game went on, George Karl said.`` You win games with stops more than making shots. I thought Kenyon Martin was the star of the game.'' JR Josh Smith scored 14 points and Marcus Camby had 15 rebounds as Denver rallied from a

substantial evidence of an active Iraqi program to produce weapons of mass destruction, but Rumsfeld believed that the site near the Iranian border presented the best chance to prove they existed before the war began. For whatever reason, the administration never made public these facts about an active WMD production facility run by terrorists in Rumsfeld quotes himself as telling the meeting,`` We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that New York, because otherwise the site would be abandoned. Iraq had an active WMD site.`` As expected, shortly after Colin Powell 's speech was delivered, many of the terrorists fled Khurmal, he wrote. An AP reporter who visited the site a few days after Colin Powell 's speech found a half-built cinderblock compound filled with heavily armed Kurdish men, video equipment and children- but no obvious sign

There were far too many hands on the steering wheel, which, in my view, was a formula for running the truck into a ditch, he wrote. As for Hillary Clinton , Joe Biden and other critics who had at first supported the Iraq war, Rumsfeld wrote:`` You wouldn't want to be in a foxhole with them.''
